Package com.example.emojibrite

package com.example.emojibrite
  • Class
    Description
    AccountCreationActivity
    Activity for the account creation process Uses fragments to navigate through the account creation process Passes the user object to the first fragment in the nav graph
    AccountCreationActivityTest
    Test class for the AccountCreationActivity
    AddEventFragment
    AddEventFragment is a DialogFragment used to create a new event or edit an existing one.
    AttendeesActivity
    Activity for the attendees
    Database
    Database class to handle the database
    Database.ImageBitmapCallBack
    An interface that serves as a callback for image processing operations
    Database.OnUserDocumentRetrievedListener
    An interface that serves as a callback for user document retrieval operations
    Database.ProfileImageCallBack
    An interface that is used as a callback for image processing operations
    Database.SignInCallBack
    An interface that is used as a callback for sign-in operations
    Database.UserNameDBCallBack
    An interface that is used as a callback for user name retrieval operations
    Event
    This is a construction class for events
    EventActivityTest
     
    EventAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying Event objects in a ListView.
    EventDetailsActivity
    EventDetailsActivity is responsible for displaying the detailed information of a selected event.
    EventHome
    EventHome is an AppCompatActivity that serves as the main page for displaying a list of events.
    EventRepository
     
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FragmentTest
     
    loginTest
     
    MainActivity
    MainActivity class to handle the main activity of the app
    NameScreenFragment
    NameScreenFragment is the fragment for the name screen.
    PreviewScreenFragment
    PreviewScreenFragment is the fragment that displays the user's profile picture and name before the user is taken to the EventHome Activity.
    ProfileActivity
    The main activity for displaying and editing user profiles.
    ProfileActivityTest
     
    ProfileEditFragment
    A DialogFragment for editing user profile information.
    ProfileEditFragment.OnProfileUpdateListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a user's profile is updated.
    ProfileEditFragmentTest
     
    ProfileImageGenerator
    This class is used to generate a profile image for a user using the ui-avatars.com API.
    ProfileImageGenerator.OnCompleteListener<T>
    This interface is used to provide a callback for when the profile image is generated and stored in the database.
    QRCodeCheckActivity
    Activity for displaying and sharing a QR code associated with event check-in.
    QRCodeEventActivity
    Activity for displaying and sharing a QR code associated with event Display.
    QRGeneratorSharing
    Class responsible for generating QR code images and sharing them.
    SplashLogoActivity
     
    UploadImageScreenFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    Users
    Users class to store the user's information
